list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a gun, especially one fired from shoulder level, having a long spirally grooved barrel intended to make a bullet spin and thereby have greater accuracy over a long distance.
make spiral grooves in (a gun or its barrel or bore) to make a bullet spin and thereby have greater accuracy over a long distance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there are four basic ways to rifle a gun barrel
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có bốn cách cơ bản để súng trường súng bắn súng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hit, throw, or kick (a ball or puck) hard and straight.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he rifled a hard, rising shot from just inside the blue line
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta thốt ra một cú sút xa, trỗi dậy từ bên trong đường màu xanh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: search through something in a hurried way in order to find or steal something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she rifled through the cassette tapes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy thốt ra qua băng cassette
